Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualView
public class VirtualView extends Object
This class manages the virtual view of the Server, reading input and sending specific messages to the clients

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    VirtualView(Controller controller)
    Constructor Initialize the controller and the client handlers list

    • cloudChosen

      public void cloudChosen(int cloudPosition, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to give the cloud at the specified position at the player with the specified nickname
      Parameters:
      cloudPosition - the position of the cloud
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int endPosition, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to move Mother nature on the island at the specified position
      Parameters:
      endPosition - the position of the island where the client wants to set Mother Nature
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public void moveStudentToIsland(int islandPosition, PawnColor color, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to move the specified student to the specified island
      Parameters:
      islandPosition - the position of the island
      color - the color of the student to move
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • moveStudentToDining

      public void moveStudentToDining(PawnColor color, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to move the specified student to the dining room of the player
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to move
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • useAssistant

      public void useAssistant(int weight, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to use the Assistant card of the specified weight
      Parameters:
      weight - the weight of the assistant card
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • useCharacter

      public void useCharacter(int[] colors, int characterPosition, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to use the Character card at the specified position. The Character to use is one of them: JESTER, MINSTREL
      Parameters:
      colors - the array of the color of the student to move. If the Character is the JESTER, the first 3 colors are the students present at the entrance, the others are the students on the Character card. If the Character is the MINSTREL, the first 2 colors are the students present at the entrance, the other 2 are students in the dining room
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • useCharacter

      public void useCharacter(int islandPosition, PawnColor color, int characterPosition, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to use the Character card at the specified position. The Character to use is one of them: MONK
      Parameters:
      islandPosition - the position of the island where the card will activate its effect
      color - the color of the student to move
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • useCharacter

      public void useCharacter(PawnColor color, int characterPosition, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to use the Character card at the specified position. The Character to use is one of them: SPOILED_PRINCESS, THIEF, MUSHROOM_HUNTER
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to move
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • useCharacter

      public void useCharacter(int islandPosition, int characterPosition, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to use the Character card at the specified position. The Character to use is one of them: HERALD, GRANDMOTHER_HERBS
      Parameters:
      islandPosition - the position of the island where the card will activate its effect
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • useCharacter

      public void useCharacter(int characterPosition, String playerNickname)
      Elaborates the request, from a client, to use the Character card at the specified position. The Character to use is one of them: MAGIC_DELIVERY_MAN, CENTAUR, KNIGHT, FARMER
      Parameters:
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that does the request

    • setUpGameInfo

      public void setUpGameInfo(int numPlayer, boolean expert, String playerNickname)
      Inform the controller about the number of player and the difficulty of the game
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - the number of player of this game
      expert - true if the game will be played in expert mode
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that provides the information

    • colorSetUp

      public void colorSetUp(String nickname)
      Starts the request of the color of the Tower available
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that will choose the color

    • setUpPlayerColor

      public void setUpPlayerColor(TowerColor color, String playerNickname)
      Controls if the color chosen is available: if it is, creates a new player, otherwise asks to choose again another color
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the tower chosen
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player that chose the color

    • getClientHandlerByNickname

      public ClientHandler getClientHandlerByNickname(String nickname)
      Returns the client handler associated to the specified nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      Returns:
      the client handler associated to the specified nickname

    • printGameBoard

      public void printGameBoard(Game game)
      Creates, for each client handler, the info of the game
      Parameters:
      game - the current game

    • printError

      public void printError(ClientException exception, String player)
      Informs the specific client handler if any exception occurs
      Parameters:
      exception - the exception occurred
      player - the nickname associated with the client handler to inform

    • printInterrupt

      public void printInterrupt(String nickname)
      Informs all the client handler but the one associated with the specified nickname if any interruption occurred
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player to not inform

    • printWinner

      public void printWinner(String winner1, String winner2)
      Informs all the client handlers about the nickname of the winner (or the nicknames of the winners, if there is a draw )
      Parameters:
      winner1 - the nickname of the winner
      winner2 - the nickname of the second winner, it is null if there is not a draw
